original_text: They fixed the other ends of the two chains to the shoulder pieces of the ephod, in the front. They joined them to the gold pieces that held the onyx stones.
korean_text: 그 땋은 두 사슬의 다른 두 끝을 에봇 앞 두 어깨받이의 금 테에 매고

sentences.original_text: They fixed the other ends of the two chains
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 두 사슬의 다른 쪽 끝을 고정했습니다

sentences.original_text: to the shoulder pieces of the ephod
